details.songOfAdoration: How Deep the Father's Love for Us

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

details.songOfResponse: Just a Closer Walk with Thee #448

list: We gave out water and tracts, and invited dozens to worship with us during the music festival last week. Special thanks to all those who volunteered their time or donated money, water, ice, or other materials!
We will meet at Rawlings-Stinson park for our Sunday evening services tonight and September 22. Bring a lawn chair (or two!) and come ready to sing so others may hear of our glorious Lord!
